title: Lag spike without ping changes
body: I haven't played League in awhile, but I decided to play again today and I needed to update to the current patch (6.24? I think) and every game I've played in since has been laggy as hell. even with the graphics settings on low, all of a sudden I'll see my health start depleting and my abilities not appearing then suddenly I teleport into a place I wasn't before and i'll either have done a terrible trade or i'll have died. I've restarted my computer, fiddled with the video settings as well as closed everything that was running along side the game. No fix yet, anyone having any trouble with the same kinda thing? or have some way to fix it?

replies.body: The first thing we need to figure out is if you're having fps issues or network problems like packet loss. Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your connection to the game server.  Let me know the results!

Heres exactly what it said

Your average ping was 28 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 51ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 4.48%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss.

What are your thoughts?
(Thanks for your help!)

Thanks for these details!  Based of that, it sounds like you've having some pretty serious packet loss which can be caused by a weak connection or even how your ISP routes to the game servers.  My suggestion here would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your network.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know if it does the trick!
